long_description: The warm REI Plaid Aviator hat is worthy of frigid Arctic weather or a New Year's Day polar bear dip in the lake! Plaid polyester/wool exterior gives the hat a stylish look. Chin and earflaps are lined with soft sherpa fleece for warmth and comfort; crown is lined with polyester fleece. REI Plaid Aviator hat features polyester-insulated earflaps that offer protection from harsh winds; secure flaps around your chin or atop your head with the snap closure.
short_description: The warm REI Plaid Aviator hat is worthy of frigid Arctic weather or a New Year's Day polar bear dip in the lake!
